purpose: To enable the creation of interactive chatbot experiences using 3D models and AI, enhancing virtual assistant capabilities.
principle: Integrates Unity for 3D model rendering with AI services like OpenAI's GPT-3 to facilitate natural language interactions.
reusability: Designed as a Unity package, it can be easily integrated into existing Unity projects. Provides APIs for interaction with AI services.
limitations: Requires Unity knowledge for setup, limited to platforms supported by Unity, relies on external AI services for language processing.
name: ChatdollKit
description: ChatdollKit enables you to make your 3D model into a chatbot
highlight: Transforms 3D models into interactive chatbots using Unity and AI integrations.
